trans-unit.source: Used as a parameter object in the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.GetToolTipText" /> event of the root <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 在根 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.GetToolTipText" /> 对象的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart" /> 事件中用作参数对象。

trans-unit.source: This class is exposed as the `e` parameter in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.GetToolTipText> event, and provides the mouse position, tooltip text, if any, and details about the chart element over which the mouse cursor is held when the event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 此类公开为`e`中的参数<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.GetToolTipText>事件，并提供鼠标位置、 工具提示文本，如果有的话和有关鼠标光标停留通过其中引发事件时的图表元素的详细信息。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.GetToolTipText> event is raised several seconds after the mouse cursor is held over a relevant chart element.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.GetToolTipText>几秒钟后鼠标光标停留在相关的图表元素，将引发事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ToolTipEventArgs> class contains the following properties:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ToolTipEventArgs>类包含以下属性：

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ToolTipEventArgs.X%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ToolTipEventArgs.Y%2A> properties, which are used to get the mouse coordinates.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ToolTipEventArgs.X%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ToolTipEventArgs.Y%2A>属性，用于获取鼠标坐标。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ToolTipEventArgs.Text%2A> property, which is used to get the tooltip for the chart element that the event is raised for.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ToolTipEventArgs.Text%2A>属性，用于针对引发该事件的图表元素中获取工具提示。

trans-unit.source: Note that many of the chart elements have a `ToolTip`, `LegendToolTip`, and/or `LabelToolTip` property that you can use to assign a tooltip.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，许多图表元素具有`ToolTip`， `LegendToolTip`，和/或`LabelToolTip`可用于将分配工具提示的属性。

trans-unit.source: These elements include legends, annotations, data points, series, axes, titles, custom labels, and strip lines.
trans-unit.target: 这些元素包括图例、 批注、 数据点、 序列、 轴、 标题、 自定义标签和条带线。

trans-unit.source: This property can also be used to override the tooltip for a chart element, or to set a tooltip for a chart element that doesn't have a `ToolTip` property.
trans-unit.target: 若要替代的图表元素，工具提示，或设置不具有的图表元素的工具提示，也可以使用此属性`ToolTip`属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ToolTipEventArgs.HitTestResult%2A> property, which provides information on the chart element for which the event was raised.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ToolTipEventArgs.HitTestResult%2A>属性，用于提供有关为其引发事件的图表元素的信息。

trans-unit.source: X-coordinate of mouse.
trans-unit.target: 鼠标的 X 坐标。

trans-unit.source: Y-coordinate of mouse.
trans-unit.target: 鼠标的 Y 坐标。

trans-unit.source: The tooltip text.
trans-unit.target: 工具提示文本。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.HitTestResult" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.HitTestResult" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ToolTipEventArgs" /> class with the specified <paramref name="x" />, <paramref name="y" />, <paramref name="text" /> and <paramref name="result" /> parameters.
trans-unit.target: 用指定的 <paramref name="x" />、<paramref name="y" />、<paramref name="text" /> 和 <paramref name="result" /> 参数初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ToolTipEventArgs" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.HitTestResult" /> object, which provides information about the chart element that the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.GetToolTipText" /> event was raised for.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.HitTestResult" /> 对象，该对象提供了有关引发 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.GetToolTipText" /> 事件的图表元素的信息。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.HitTestResult" /> object that represents information for the element the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.GetToolTipText" /> event was raised for.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.HitTestResult" /> 对象，该对象提供引发 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.GetToolTipText" /> 事件的元素的信息。

trans-unit.source: This property is exposed in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.GetToolTipText> event of the root <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> object.
trans-unit.target: 此属性公开在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.GetToolTipText>事件根<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ToolTipEventArgs.HitTestResult%2A> property can be used to get the object the event was raised for, the type of the chart element the event was raised for, and so forth.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ToolTipEventArgs.HitTestResult%2A>属性可以用于获取引发该事件时，为针对，引发的事件的图表元素的类型的对象等。

trans-unit.source: For further details, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.HitTestResult> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 有关更多详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.HitTestResult>类概述。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the tooltip, if any, of the chart element over which the mouse cursor is held.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置当鼠标光标停留在图表元素上时所显示的工具提示（如果有）。

trans-unit.source: This property can also set a tooltip for this chart element.
trans-unit.target: 此属性也可以为此图表元素设置工具提示。

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="string" /> value that represents the tooltip text of the element the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.GetToolTipText" /> event was raised for.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see langword="string" /> 值，该值表示引发 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.GetToolTipText" /> 事件的元素的工具提示文本。

trans-unit.source: This property is exposed in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.GetToolTipText> event of the root <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> object.
trans-unit.target: 此属性公开在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.GetToolTipText>事件根<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ToolTipEventArgs.Text%2A> property, which is used to get the tooltip for the chart element that the event is raised for.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ToolTipEventArgs.Text%2A>属性，用于针对引发该事件的图表元素中获取工具提示。

trans-unit.source: Note that many of the chart elements have a `ToolTip`, `LegendToolTip`, and/or `LabelToolTip` property that you can use to assign a tooltip.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，许多图表元素具有`ToolTip`， `LegendToolTip`，和/或`LabelToolTip`可用于将分配工具提示的属性。

trans-unit.source: These elements include legends, annotations, data points, series, axes, titles, custom labels, and strip lines.
trans-unit.target: 这些元素包括图例、 批注、 数据点、 序列、 轴、 标题、 自定义标签和条带线。

trans-unit.source: If you get this property, it will always return a zero-length string for any chart element items that do not have a tooltip.
trans-unit.target: 如果你获取此属性，它将始终返回不具有工具提示的任何图表元素项的长度为零的字符串。

trans-unit.source: You can set this property to:
trans-unit.target: 可以将此属性设置为：

trans-unit.source: Override the tooltip for any of the chart elements capable of assigning tooltips.
trans-unit.target: 重写任何能够将分配工具提示的图表元素的工具提示。

trans-unit.source: Assign a tooltip to a chart element that does not support tooltips.
trans-unit.target: 将工具提示分配给不支持工具提示的图表元素。

trans-unit.source: Gets the X coordinate of the point the mouse cursor is held over when the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.GetToolTipText" /> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 获取引发 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.GetToolTipText" /> 事件时鼠标光标停留的点的 X 坐标。

trans-unit.source: An <see langword="integer" /> value that represents the X coordinate of the mouse cursor.
trans-unit.target: 表示鼠标光标 X 坐标的 <see langword="integer" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: This property is exposed in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.GetToolTipText> event of the root <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> object.
trans-unit.target: 此属性公开在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.GetToolTipText>事件根<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>对象。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ToolTipEventArgs.X%2A> property to get the X screen coordinate of the point the mouse cursor is held over when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.GetToolTipText> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ToolTipEventArgs.X%2A>属性来获取点的 X 屏幕坐标鼠标光标停留时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.GetToolTipText>引发事件。

trans-unit.source: Note that the X coordinate is measured in pixels; the point (0,0) corresponds to the top-left corner of the chart.
trans-unit.target: 请注意的 X 坐标，以像素为单位;点 (0，0) 对应于图表左上角。

trans-unit.source: Gets the Y coordinate of the point the mouse cursor is held over when the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.GetToolTipText" /> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 获取引发 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.GetToolTipText" /> 事件时鼠标光标停留的点的 Y 坐标。

trans-unit.source: An <see langword="integer" /> that represents the Y coordinate of the mouse cursor.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="integer" />表示鼠标光标的 Y 坐标。

trans-unit.source: This property is exposed in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.GetToolTipText> event of the root <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> object.
trans-unit.target: 此属性公开在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.GetToolTipText>事件根<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>对象。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ToolTipEventArgs.Y%2A> property to get the Y screen coordinate of the point the mouse cursor is held over when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.GetToolTipText> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ToolTipEventArgs.Y%2A>属性来获取点的 Y 屏幕坐标鼠标光标停留时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.GetToolTipText>引发事件。

trans-unit.source: Note that the Y coordinate is measured in pixels; the point (0,0) corresponds to the top-left corner of the chart.
trans-unit.target: 请注意的 Y 坐标，以像素为单位;点 (0，0) 对应于图表左上角。
